HomePage.title: I'm Ahmad Adham
HomePage.about: As a passionate Front-end Developer, I am eager to create visually captivating and user-friendly designs. I may be at the beginning of my journey, but I am dedicated to learning, growing, and building amazing experiences. Let's collaborate and make something great together!
HomePage.Programs: Programs, offices, and experiences that I use

0.title: UI/UX Design
0.description: I design responsive and modern user interfaces that provide a smooth user experience across all devices.

1.title: Performance Optimization
1.description: I build fast and optimized websites using best practices like lazy loading, caching, and image optimization.

2.title: Clean & Reusable Code
2.description: I write clean, reusable, and well-structured code using React, Tailwind CSS, and modern development tools.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: Working with this designer was an absolute pleasure. They delivered a stunning website that perfectly captured our brand identity. Their attention to detail and creativity exceeded our expectations.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.content: I hired this freelancer for our logo design and brand identity. The results were outstanding! They took the time to understand our vision and translated it into a perfect visual representation of our brand.

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.content: Our online store needed a complete redesign, and this developer delivered beyond our expectations. The site is not only beautiful but also performs exceptionally well, leading to increased sales.

testimonials.name: David Thompson
testimonials.content: As a fellow designer, I have high standards. This freelancer met and exceeded them. Their technical skills combined with creative vision make them stand out in the industry.

HomePage.answers: Answers to common questions about my skills and work

faqs.question: What core skills do I have?
faqs.answer: I'm skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and I understand the basics of TypeScript.

faqs.question: Can I build a professional website from scratch?
faqs.answer: Yes, I can build responsive and modern designs using Front-End technologies, focusing on performance and user experience.

faqs.question: Am I able to work with APIs?
faqs.answer: Yes, I have experience fetching data from APIs and integrating it into websites using React and Next.js.

faqs.question: Can I edit or improve an existing website?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! I can analyze the existing codebase and enhance it or add new features.

HomePage.dish: I'm always looking for opportunities to collaborate, learn, and create. Whether you have a project in mind or just want to connect, I'd love to hear from you!

AboutPage.title: I'm Ahmad Adham
AboutPage.about: As a passionate Front-end Developer, I am eager to create visually captivating and user-friendly designs. I may be at the beginning of my journey, but I am dedicated to learning, growing, and building amazing experiences. Let's collaborate and make something great together!

0.text: I focus on writing clean and maintainable code.

1.text: I'm always learning and improving my skills.

3.text: I care about responsiveness and performance.

0.title: First Steps
0.description: Started learning the fundamentals with C++, OOP, and algorithms.

1.title: My First Project
1.description: Built my first complete project using only React.

2.title: Exploring the Web
2.description: Learned HTML and CSS to structure and style websites.

3.title: Moving Forward
3.description: Now working with Next.js, Tailwind, Supabase and more.

0.title: Beginning My Coding Journey
0.desc: Started learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript fundamentals through online courses and tutorials. Built my first static websites and began to understand the basics of web development.

1.title: Diving into React
1.desc: After building a foundation with vanilla JavaScript, I began learning React. Started with the core concepts like components, props, and state, then moved on to hooks and more advanced patterns.

2.title: Exploring Next.js & Tailwind
2.desc: Expanded my skills to include Next.js for its server-side rendering capabilities and Tailwind CSS for rapid UI development. Started building more complex projects with these technologies.

3.title: Continuous Learning & Building
3.desc: Currently focused on deepening my understanding of React and Next.js while exploring TypeScript and state management solutions. Building projects to apply what I’ve learned and discover new challenges.

0.title: Frontend Development
0.desc: Building responsive, accessible, and visually appealing user interfaces using modern web technologies.

1.title: UI/UX Principles
1.desc: Learning to create intuitive user experiences with thoughtful design patterns and accessibility in mind.

2.title: Problem Solving
2.desc: Developing my analytical thinking and debugging skills to tackle complex coding challenges effectively.

PortfolioPageid.outtype: After building and deploying the project, I noticed a significant improvement in my development speed and problem-solving abilities. The application became a practical proof of concept that helped me validate core concepts such as state management, performance optimization, and user experience.

ContactPage.disc: I'm always thrilled to dive into exciting new projects, explore bold and creative ideas, and seize incredible opportunities to collaborate and bring your unique visions to life in the most impactful way possible.
